column3: I saw Jane {{c1::on}} the bus this morning.
How did you get here? Did you come {{c1::by}} train?
I didn't feel like walking, so I went home {{c1::in}} a taxi.
How much will it cost to the airport {{c1::by}} taxi?
Did you come here {{c1::in}} Sarah's car or yours?
The injured man was taken to hospital {{c1::by}} ambulance.
I couldn't find a seat {{c1::on}} the train. It was full.
He doesn't drive much. He goes everywhere {{c1::by}} bike.
How long does it take to cross the Atlantic {{c1::by}} ship?
